body:
[Large Sofa] A Long sofa sits in the middle of the room. It looks comfortable, but you don't feel like sitting down right now. 
[Forbearance]: "Don't judge the book by its cover. This sofa could injure us if it's not comfortable. Inspect it first." 

[1]: [Inspect Sofa] 
[2]: [Sit on Sofa] 
[3]: [Leave]
title: Start1

body:
[Forbearance] You inspect the sofa. It looks comfortable. We should try it. 

[1]: [Sit on Sofa]
title: InspectFail

body:
[Forbearance] You closely inspect the sofa. It looks like a hazard. Your mind tells you to avoid it at all costs. 

[1]: [Sit on Sofa] 
[2]: [Leave]
title: InspectPass

body:
[Large Sofa] You sit on the sofa. It's not comfortable at all, it goes agains your own existance. (-1 Health) 

[1]: [Leave]
title: Sit

body:
[Large Sofa]: You leave the sofa alone. We all know where this would end. Don't sit on it. 

[1]: [Leave it alone]
title: Start2
